content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to get some fresh air just after 10 pm yesterday (may 5th). first thing i've noticed was a "shooting start", i thougth that was pretty cool, first one this year :).
then i have noticed two airplanes far in the distance (me facing west).
then i look up to admire the clear and beautiful night sky, full of stars. all of a sudden, i notice a series of dimmed lights flying in formation. the formation was similar to a shevron, i could also notice a fairly distinct boudary (or the edge) of the object the lights where part of. the object resembled a flying wing like northrop yb-49 but it almost looked transparent.
it flew in a straight line from south to north, at about 80deg up from where i was standing. it was completely silent!
i couldn't tell how high (altitude) it was from the ground but in relation to the tree that it flew by, the wingspan was about 1.5 to 2 meters (the tree is about 12 meters tall). the object disappeared behind the tree.
content.summary: Transparent, delta-wing like on a straight, silent, fast flight path.

content.detailedDescription: u f o =  long , round cylinder ,rounded ends, colour, grey metallic/ aluminum with even spaced things on side,like large rivets , could be window/porthole  ,   facing east- west ,over head , on clear bright sunny day , no clouds, hovering, but with earth revolving to the east it was slowly moving west,,  when my father came in for lunch i said what is that? he looked up and said i dont know, and did not think any more about it!I have always wondered what it was ( after lunch it was not there,)i was about 6 years old then, === the height? about1000 to 2 or 3000 ft. ,
content.summary: Long ,round cyilnder, hovering

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i are both night-owls.  we stepped out onto our east facing front steps to smoke, and i, incidentally, had my macaw parrot on my shoulder.  i was facing east, when we both heard a very loud ground shaking boom. 
 as we both looked in the direction of the boom, (east) there was another lesser boom. they were milliseconds apart, but the second was quieter, kind of like a boom, boom! simultaneously a bright white fireball zoomed all the way from the eastern horizon, flew overhead, and disappeared over our house top going west, leaving a whitish trail which momentarily was visible from beginning to end, or, horizon to horizon.  the space of time from hearing the booms, to the fireball passing over our heads was about 2.5 seconds.  it was spectacular. 
 i would compare the intesity of the first boom, which was the louder of the two, to being within 4 or 5 blocks of a large professional grade firework going off. babooom! my bird's normal reaction to something frightening is not to fly away, but to dig in with his claws, hunker down, and try to climb under any nook or craw in my clothing, which he did. 
 i did have to immediately reaasure him, as he sensed my excitement and uncertainty of what had just transpired.  this ranks way up there, with me, as in the top ten of very unusual or spectacular sitings i have ever had in my 60 years of life.  one thing that distinguished this from any other fireball type sighting i have ever had, was that it was pure white, and i thought i caught a glimpse of orange.  other firealls were blue, bluegreen and green with flashes of orange, yellow or white coming off them.  only shooting stars which were much smaller have ever appeared all white, or blue-white.  this was so close (or low) as to cause a sonic boom. after starting this report, i also made a non-emergency call to 911, both to report, and to find out if anyone else had reported the boom or the sighting.
content.summary: Heard sonic boom, then white fireball passes over leaving trail

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was early summer in the pas, manitoba when my (soon to be) brother-in-law and i were playing basketball late one night in july of 1993 at the high school in town at between 1 and 2 in the morning. at first we seen what we thought were shooting stars. as we looked more we seen that these 'shooting stars' (or asteroids) were streaking across the sky in all directions (up, down, sideways, all various angles of ascent and descent too). then we noticed one shoot down at an angle and then make a sharp angle turn in a fraction of a second. at this point we knew these were not 'shooting stars'! what were they though??? all we could tell is that they were white lights streaking across the sky in the eastern sky front from lower horizon level up to about '11 o'clock' - almost straight above us but not quite.

so we got the idea to shine our lights up at the sky at it and flash them on and off, high beams on and off - varying the pattern of flashing. we also drove the car onto a small inclined hill in the nearby park to do this. when we did (and the more we did it) the more active these 'shooting stars' became. it was like we were communicating with them through the varied flashing of our head lights on the car - because, as we flashed our lights they began to 'dance' across the sky more rapidly, more frequently and with more sharp angle instantaneous turns. they even began to make 'zig-zag' patterns across the eastern part of the sky. 

we were enthralled and excited as to what this could be. so we came up with the idea to go out of town, find another hill and, again, flash our lights at the sky in the darkness to see if we could lure one down! so we went north of town down a reserve road to the east - on the north side of the saskatchewan river (the pas being south of the river). so we found a short road leading up into a cemetery that had an incline enough to shine our lights up into the sky. 

as we flashed our lights at first nothing happened. we tried for a few minutes and were about to give up when i told joe, my brother-in-law who was driving the car, to try one more time. sure enough, when he flashed the lights again we seen one light streak across the eastern sky from the south east to the north east approximately. then it stopped low on the horizon, just above the tree line to the north east about 2 or 3 miles away. the light then started to grow larger. we realized it was coming towards us! we had definitely managed to lure one of these lights down to us!! as it got closer (and very quickly!) we began to panic in fear. we hadn't really believed we would actually 'lure' one down! (i don't know if we really knew what we were going to expect). we were so afraid at this point both of us became speechless. but joe 'slammed' the car in reverse back down the road on the hill to the cemetery to get back on the gravel road back to town. 

by the time we reached the road the light from this ufo was right in front of us - extremely bright and blinding! joe spun the car around quickly and spun the tires to take off as fast as he could. it continued right behind us shining this very bright light into the rear windows of the car now. the light was so bright that even when we lowered all the mirrors it was still blinding. to turn around and look at it was way too bright to do so. it hurt the eyes it was so bright! 

no matter how fast we went it kept to the exact speed as us - not getting any further behind or gaining on us. mind you it was right 'on our bumper' from the moment we started heading back down the road to town after exiting the cemetery road. and joe had the car going as fast as it could go/as he could handle it on the gravel in the dark. but then, after about a mile, it did speed up a little and began to pass us. but it didn't pass right by us. it just kept pace with us again right beside us on the driver side of the car now. this is where it got really strange for us. 

first of all, we were both still speechless (literally). every time we tried to talk we couldn't! perhaps it was just because of so much fear. especially when it was travelling along side us we became even more in shock and fear. at this point it was no longer just a (very) bright white light shining at us. there were many different coloured (colored) lights flashing in a circular motion to give the appearance that it was spinning. these coloured lights changed 'spinning' through the sequence of the spectrum (like a rainbow shining from the lighter yellows through to the oranges, reds, greens, blues, turquoise etc right up to black for a moment and then right back to the bright bright white light - every colour and shade of the spectrum it would go through in order, then start over again: bright white, yellows, orange and the darker colours, then a quick nano second of blackness then the bright white again).. this sequence of lights changing colours white through all the colours to black and then white again only took a total of about 1 or 2 seconds. it repeated this sequence many many times - too many to remember. 

anyways, as this was happening we were still racing down the road - speechless. i wanted to tell joe to slam on the brakes seeing as we couldn't out run it. but not a word or sound could i utter. i thought that maybe if we stopped suddenly it would just fly on by us and leave us behind. although i couldn't speak somehow my thought to hit the brakes got through to joe like he read my mind. in fact it seemed like we had telepathic abilities at this time to understand each other's thoughts so that speech wasn't even necessary! so joe slammed the brakes suddenly and came to a quick stop. we expected this ufo to just keep going on by us - or were hoping. but it didn't! in fact the exact precise moment we came to a stop it did too!! it stopped next to us no different then your shadow would stop when you stop - instantaneously.

at this point we lost track of time. it was like we were in some sort of trance with this thing hovering right beside us with it's ever changing coloured lights spinning around hypnotizing us! at this point we were both just staring into the changing coloured lights unable to move, unable to speak, unable to look away! we had tried to get it's attention. now that we had it this ufo wouldn't let us take our attention away from it! it seemed almost like time stopped, all thought stopped. all there was was this object beside us gripping our focus upon it, locking our eyes so that they were transfixed upon the colourful lights. like i said we couldn't tell how much time had passed. but i managed to 'snap myself to' finally just as joe was coming to as well. we were still in a trance like state though and still reading each others minds as we agreed that we better start driving again. 

this time, as we started to drive away. the ufo didn't start moving with us. it waited a few seconds and then began to follow us a little further behind than when it was first following right behind 'on our bumper'. so we kept driving back to the highway leading back into town with this ufo still behind us about 30 to 40 feet or so. as we turned on the highway south back into the pas it did not take the highway with us. it went down the railway tracks leading to the railway bridge (on the east side of the highway bridge). we both thought this was interesting and we relayed those thoughts to each other. 

then another extremely strange thing happened. as we drove towards the highway bridge and the ufo flew towards the railway bridge we expected that the ufo would either a) fly between the bridges or b) fly on the other side of the railway bridge because it was probably just a little too large to fly on the bridge itself down the tracks. but to yet another surprise it did neither. it managed to fly right down the tracks but it appeared to be flying right through the solid steel of the bridge from one end to the other!!! 

all joe and i could do to 'talk' was drop our jaws in amazement at everything that was transpiring before our eyes - unable to believe that we were both witnessing this together, unable to make a sound, unable to believe our eyes! we couldn't both be hallucinating we thought to each other.. then as we got to the other side of the bridge as did the ufo (or, more specifically, orb i later figured it out to be to have properties to be able to fly through objects - ie: the railway bridge) this orb streaked off into the south eastern sky and was out of sight in about a second. it went from an 'object' of about 15 feet across/along (as it was 'circular/disc like') when beside us to a pinpoint of light as it shot off up into the sky and then poof! it was gone.

it took us about half an hour before we could speak again. we just drove in silence all the way through town to the south end now, still reading each others thoughts not knowing what to do next. we fleeted thoughts back and forth about trying this again on the south side of town - to see if we could 'catch' anymore! i'm not sure why we considered this after the fright of our lives just having happened. perhaps it was the thrill or the heightening curiosity as to what we had just discovered. but we both agreed finally that we were too afraid to try that again as we were exiting town to the south into the darkness again. so joe turned around again and headed back into town and we went home.

but the story isn't quite over yet.. we told our friends and family the next day, who thought we were crazy or 'on something'. so we arranged for a supper together with the family that next day to try to convince them that we weren't making this up or hallucinating or 'on something'. we were truthfully both sober. and i'm pretty sure it isn't possible for two people to hallucinate the exact same thing. anyways we weren't making much progress convincing them until the 6 o'clock news came on. and guess what! there were actually several others who had reported various coloured lights in the eastern sky that night in the pas area, including lights that streaked across the sky at incredible speeds, instantly making sharp angle turns! so were all of these ones hallucinating too??

for further proof we phoned the local airports (one north and one east of town) to see if there happened to be any planes or helicopters flying at that time over town or even anywhere around the pas at that time. there were none. our family didn't know what to say then!  but i sure can say a lot about it. and to this day, 20 years later, the event made such an impact on my mind (and soul maybe too) that i can remember it as if it were yesterday!
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 'shooting star' look that turned to sudden sharp angle direction changes then ascended and chased us in a car

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside restaurant with wife at about 10:30 pm and seen light glowing in the sky, it was like an orange flame almost. it was moving slow in one direction then stopped and started moving in another direction then disappeared. we were looking at the stars because it was a clear night and noticed it was very bright compared to the stars. thought it might have been a helicopter but up to high to be one and it was slowing down and then going faster it did that at least two times and then it turned west and going up at the same time then completely  vanished !!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen glowing light in sky slowly moving then stop and go in another direction.

content.detailedDescription: i was in the army at ft. irwin california in the mojave desert. it was around 2 am in the morning. was as clear of a sky as you could ask for. a friend and i were on guard duty as everyone was sleeping. we were talking just doing our shift. we were not far from a mountain when we seen this object following the ridge line of the top of the mountain it was not moving fast at this point. the object was casting a solid light downward that was in a shape of a upside down cone. meaning it was very narrow to wider. this object we just watched it go the length of the mountain at the top shining the light down. it made absolutely no noise at all. i have personally been on and seen most all of the military aircraft while in the military. it was not a military aircraft or any aircraft myself or my friend had ever seen. after the craft got to the end of the mountain top it moved very swiftly to the left or east. maybe a mile or so from the mountain. this was just over our head maybe i would guess 1000 to 1500 feet above us. light still shining downward. then ,in an instant, the light reversed to the top of the aircraft shining upward. all at the same time in that same instant (bare with me it is difficult to describe what happened so you can visualize it)the light at that instant was shining in a cone shape making a not so big ring circle. the craft just ascended upward at a speed so fast it was gone instantly. when it ascended and instantly gone it made a very loud boom. then the amazing part of this with the light. this is not easy to describe. craft ascends in direction of the ring of light goes through the ring very loud boom and now the ring of light gets so bright it is like its day. while that is going on the ring is expanding exponentially from the small ring of light to getting bigger and bigger at same time getting less bright as it gets bigger until it dissipates into nothing from what my friend and i could see from what i remember about it. the craft was kind of chevron shaped. it was a very interesting experience. my friend and i made the decision not to talk about it to anyone. as we were not sure how the military would react to us. i was in artillery and i don't know what the protocol is when someone in the military would report such an event. honestly i don't care what anyone thinks or believes me or not i know what i seen. my friend and i did not want to take the chance and find out. i am very sure other people had seen it as we were not the only ones out their in the desert. i had thought about reporting this story to mufon a long time ago. i just felt like someone else should know. i would like to know if anyone has ever seen a similar event. especially with the light.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Out in the desert with absolutly no light but the stars. very clear night no clouds at all.

content.detailedDescription: My roommate  and i were taking a ride down a dirt road on a saturday in september .My car is convertible and i had the top down,enjoying the nice day.The road is an old stagecoach road ,with only two houses in sight,one right in front of this event.While driving ,i looked straight up ,saw something only thirty feet above my car.Then i looked straight ahead not believing what i saw.About four seconds later i looked up again and saw this object hovering over my carat only thirty feet .Right away i ask my friend to look up at that thing and tell me what you think it is .He says it is a remote control something.Then the object started to move behind us and head that direction.So i turned my car around and as soon as  i start moving back the way i came from ,the object starts to move off to the right (west) and i stop and watch the object go to about three miles away ,up in the air fast.It hovered for about one minute then went out of site.Then we agree that the object was not a remote control anything ,and agree it was a ufo.The object was about fifteen feet tall five feet wide had three legs on the bottom of it.The legs were a different color than the body of the object.The body was black the legs were lead or gray.The object was hollow in the center oval shaped.
content.summary: Driving with roomate in my convertible ,with top down.Looked straight up ,saw object then it changed direction followed till it went out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a girl friend of mine just pulled up to my mom's house in west tawakoni.  i remember the night because it was the perseid meteor shower on saturday, august 11th, 2012.  as we step outside of her van i pick up on a magnetic feeling, like the one where even if you have your eyes closed you can feel a tv turn on.  i said "look!" and as we looked up, coming over the treeline heading due south, a couple of acres south of lake tawakoni, probably 50- 100ft up, flew a dark flying v.  the color of the metallic bottom was like a dark blue that was a shade darker than the night sky.  there were light lining the outside edges of each "wing" of the v.  the lights were white/ yellow.  the aircraft made no noise and appeared to not travel all that fast.  maybe 60 - 100mph.  i must stress that the most eerie part aside than it's exit was its absolute silence.  we told each other later that we could "feel" that it knew of our witnessing.  i felt like for a moment that i was making "mental eye contact"  it's exit from our sight is hard to describe:  imagine an invisible line that as the ship passed through it, those parts in front of the line were invisible, and as it drove into the line it seemed to either "cloak from the nose down" or possibly entered a wormhole, which is crazy to think there could be such a wormhole above my mother's house.  this isn't my only ufo encounter but it was the most intimate, and ever since, i have been constantly keep having premonitions,  before the boston bombing, i was telling everbody april 15th would be something worse than a north korean missile launch.  and i even told a few friends back in texas ( i moved to wisconsin) that i'll send them a cooler summer, and having grown up in texas its obvious that they are having a strangely cool spring.  a notable thing to mention is that in 2006 they found a massive spider web with thousands of spiders working together that has since puzzled scientists, and that spider web was less than one mile from my encounter.  i was prompted to post this to mufon because recently people eerywhere have been reporting a craft similar to the one i saw,  and what i really want to know is, have any of you been affected, or given a "gift"?

thank you for your time, and with all sincerity, c.B.
content.summary: Me and my friend both saw this flying v, looked darker than the night sky, but no noise, then cloaks right above us.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on m28 at night, just passed the hulbert turn-off.  there is nothing but darkness between hulbert and newberry on m28.  i saw 2 white lights in the distance on the south side of m28.  my initial thought was that they had build a new gas station with one of those huge signs up and i thought it was awesome because there was no where to stop and get gas at night between the "soo" (sault ste. marie) and newberry.

as i continued driving down the hill after the turn off to hulbert, i noticed the lights were moving slowing at a diagonal to the road and were coming straight towards me.  i realized it was low just above the tree line and huge.  i wondered why the other cars didn't notice it that were coming east on m28.  i slowed down and it keep gliding towards my car.  i tried to wake up my son to witness it but i could not wake him up.  he would not waken no matter what i did, shaking him and yelling his name.  the object seem to glide, no noise - it came directly over my car and as i looked up at it through the windshield as it crossed over my car - it was so huge, i couldn't see any end of it.  i don't know if it was round or oblong but it was unending.  i could not see one end or the other.  it was black underneath and there was a round cylinder section with sections up the sides.  my headlights reflected off the machine - whatever it was.  it was just blackness up into that round cylinder part.  i just remember saying to myself - begging to it, "please don't take me with you"  "i have a son who is sick and i have to get to him".  i feared it would take us.  it continued to move right over my car and towards the northeast - towards hulbert.

i was so scared, i drove a 100 miles an hour to newberry to get away from it.  i brought my brother and his friends back with me a little later to see if we could see it.  it was no where in sight.  i never want to see another object like that.  it was not from here.   a few years later i did see a black triangle object one night going to rudyard on a back road.  it appeared out of the fog and when the object seemed to notice i saw it, it simply vanished in front of my eyes.  it was incredible and i wondered what that was.  i had a strong feeling that was some stealth govt object at the time and i still do today.  the first one was not of this world.  it was too huge and too slow and absolutely quiet as it moved.
content.shape: Blimp,   Chevron,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Flying object low above the tree tops

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in california hot springs, camping with friends.

2. i was trying to show a fellow camper the difference between a plane and a satellite, he had never seen a clear sky without light pollution.

3. at first i thought the object was a plane because of the initial blink.

4. the object was stationary like a star. it blinked once, which is what got my attention. the second blink seemed to be brighter and slightly larger. the third blink was almost like a camera flash. it was more of a directed light. it did not light up or brighten the area of the campground but almost like someone turning on a flashlight directed at your eyes. afterwards the object continued to blink about 4-7 more times. with less light that the 2nd and 3rd flash.

5. when the bright flash hit my eyes i had turned my head and looked at my fellow campers, asked them if they had seen the flash and then showed them the object.  we talked about how it was not flashing in any type of pattern and how dark the area was when there was no light flashing. they confirmed the sighting and as we watched it stopped blinking.

6. it just disappeared. stopped blinking. we watched the area in and within about 30-60 seconds, what looked like satellites from two different directions seemed to cross the sky in that area... not exactly in the path of what we had seen but just below it in reference to the horizon.

i have camped up there many time and i have seen lots of activity in the sky in regards to passing satellites and planes; however, this was different and left me feeling uneasy.  i have never reported anything like this and feel a bit silly now but if there is an explanation for what i and my friends saw i would be very happy to hear it.
content.summary: Flashing light followed by satellites

content.detailedDescription:
It was a late summer afternoon,my cousin,a friend and myself were going into mountain view from the west on u.S.Hwy. 60 when i saw something above the trees, about 100/150 ft.It was an oval shaped black sphere with red pulsing through it. i didn't see any type openings or windows, but there was a silver globe or ball suspened under it, about 10 ft. or so.My cousin pulled off the hwy on to the shoulder of the road. got out of the car and stood by the car. while standing there for 2 or 3 mins. we did not hear any sound and the red pulsed through the black surface. all the sudden the silver ball appox 2 to 3 ft. in dia. disappeared up inside the sphere, i did not see a hole open up, but the ball went inside at that time i yelled at my cousin to get us out of there fast. we got in the car and sped away
as fast as possible. the sphere mover along side us for at least 2 or 3 miles. then it made a 90 degree left turn and accended at a 45 degree and was out of sight in just a few seconds. i have more things that have happened to me , but i was alone when they happened. i will make another report soon. i heard they like to take twins, i am not a twin, but i do have two crowns on my head, so i was almost a twin. so i think they are interested in me also. more to come soon. thank you.
content.summary: Oval shaped sphere hovered over tree 150/200 feet high and 200 feet away,it was black with red pulsing through it also had silver ball hainging inder it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the back deckon august 10th, 2012 (facing north). a large star appeared to the northeast. the object started out small and white, but then the sphere turned golden-orange, and slowly grew to about the size of a dime. after about two minutes another white object appeared about 2 inches away from the stationary orange sphere.. i sat and observed them for another 3 minutes of so, and they slowly went dim. i observed them turning into what looked like regular stars. during the whole observation, about 5 minutes or so, the orange sphere stayed stationary. the small white sphere orbited the other counter clock-wise.. i have no explanation for what i saw, and i ahve other friends that have seen lights with me on other occasions.  i believe that white house, tn is a ufo hotspot area or something. please write me back i would really appreciate some feedback about what this could be in my town.. 
thank you, hbo
content.summary: A stationary orange sphere occompanied by a smaller white sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Aroud 4:00am while watching a television show i noticed a single flash of blue ultra violet light that came from either out side my bed room window or some how came from in my room itself.. this event is very difficult to explain.. my first reaction was a police officer must have pulled some one over right in front of my house. (you know, how they somtimes will just flash thier lights with out the siren to get the persons attention). only this had no red light. only a single blue flash. im walking down my hall way twords the front door and i can already hear the rumbling of a small diesil motor. (the front door was open that night because we use our evap. cooler). the screan door was shut and locked. just as i reached the front door a big black mercedies utility van drove away. this van was huge and looked just like somthing you would see in a men in black kind of movie...I knew rite away, rite then, what is really going on with this alien stuff. after all this happend i started to understand things in a 4th dementional kind of way... i hope these words find the rite eyes.
 
they are us. we are them...
content.summary: Very bright, very quick flash of blue ultra violet light.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside walking my cousin out to his car. we started wrapping up our night hanging out as we are talking i look up to stare at the stars and point out what appeared to be a cluster of stars around the north star as we are watching the stars they start to move at first i thought it was just me but he then says whoa are you seeing this. we watched as they moved from below the north star by a considerable amount to on top of it so that it looked like one was on top of the other then they ascended to the top left and slowly faded out of sight. they appeared to be four prominent ones that held a pattern looked like stars reddish glow. appeared in a tall rectangle pattern two up top two at bottom. but almost seemed like there could be more just very faintly visible . they moved in a steady pace not fast but steady could not be confused with a plane or blimp or anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Looking up at the brightest star in sky 4star like objects appeared slowly moving across the sky. others were faintly visible. all moved away in same pattern until all faded out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I've been reluctant to relay this story as there's not much to it, but i assume any details can help your cause.  it was just after dusk and my living room window has a great view of the sky. we live near an airport and see planes flying over all the time. however, this night i mentioned to my fiance, joking at first, that this one light looked odd and was a ufo.  i meant nothing of it at first but we both started watching it for a while because it was flying very slow and was large. it kept coming towards oour house, maybe a mile out or so.  it  was dark so all we could see was a light but it wasn't like any light i've seen on a plane before.  it got as close as a field less than a half mile from our house, still visible from our window by tthis time we were both standing in front of the window trying to figure out what this thing was. then suddenly it dropped a green glowing "blob" into the field and flew off slightly quicker than its original pace. we heard no noise.   

that's all we witnessed, but it was pretty freaky and may be nothing at all, but i wanted to let you know. i'd prefer to remain anonymous, but feel free to contact me with any questions.
content.summary: Ufo flying near our house, dropped glowing green orb

content.detailedDescription: Ok here i go again !!!  4th sighting last month  , outside with my dogs again , when out of the north west comes an object the color of a soft white lightbulb , so i do my usual thing and shine my maglite on it!! this time this object slows turns towards me making a c pattern while doing so! when it gets closer to me it is barely moving, i happen to have a walking stick with me and i took it and started pounding on my deck steps, trying to get my wife to come outside!! the object starts turning back away towards se direction and finally is just s bound towards the top of closest mountain!! so , i started up my steps in a quick walk without taking my eyes off of it . when i got close to the top step the object just dissapeared !!! i don't know what happened it made me mad too !  because my wife missed it by about 15 seconds , i was so mad i cussed her !!! where were you? i could've been having a stroke or broke my leg down the steps!!  the object could've just shut its lights off and stopped to watch me ? it didn't cross the hill , it wasn't close enough!! the lights on this or the whole thing changed shape,3 times!!  as soon as i got in the house i wrote down everything , the shapes time date , direction speeds , anything that might help ! i've done this on the big sightings , like if they fool with or interact with me , it has paid off in the past, on one case mufon confirmed that about the same time just one county over, someone reported the same thing !!  i was told someone would come from mufon to see me , that never happened, sorry guys but its the truth!! if you don't believe me check out sightings in minnie and mcdowell ky!!! that's me!! somthin  strange is going on in the bluegrass state, and nobody cares???????
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Object was traveling in straight line until i put my flashlight on it then it changed direction toward me !! ended up doing an s shape and when i started to my door it just dissapeared !

content.detailedDescription: While exiting a house with my older and younger brothers we noticed nobody else outside, no cars, or no breeze. very strange for our street. we were right across the street from where we lived so we were very familiar with everything. then we heard what i would say sounded like you cupped your hands over your ears. then we all saw the flying saucer slowly moving at about 10mph directly over and the houses across the street. it appeared to be brushed dull metal with some glowing lights that raced around the craft which gave it the allusion it was spinning. my older brother, about 7 yrs old ran back inside the house to get our parents while my little brother and i, only 5yrs old, watched in fear trying to hide behind the brick railing on the porch. when the flying saucer was directly across the street it was only about 100 ft away. i could see the bottom very clearly. the lights chases around the perimeter at about one revolution per second. there were three supports under the craft that would clearly be for landing but the craft continued to move at the sa me speed and direction. i could even see the craft had what appeared to be rivits, but much larger, for the landing gear as well as other areas of support for the craft. the craft was about 100ft. in diameter. as soon as the craft passed us there were only four more houses on the street until it ended into a hilly wooded area. once it passed the final house it seemed to disappear as it accelerated with no sound at a speed that traveled out of sight in the blink of an eye. immediately after the craft disappeared my brother, mother, as well as many others in the house poured out to see nothing. ironically, at the same time, the street began to return to normal with cars, kids playing and regular activities. no one saw anything but us three. my mother proceeded to separate us and have us draw a picture of what we saw. she told us we all drew the same thing. i don't remember drawing anything as i was only 5yrs old, but my older brother and i to this day vividly remember what we saw.
content.summary: Saw flying saucer move slowly across sky during daylight

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my work and at ten forty pm and as i got to the top of a big hill,bright green lights came from above and were hitting the car and ground all around me. must of been 30 or more. it was almost like a strobe light. i could see them hitting the car hood ,windows and probably 50 feet to the sides of the road. the whole thing happened quick. maybe 5 seconds.I first noticed the lights in my mirror shooting across my back window and at first i thought it was an emergency vehicle then noticed no one was behind me. then the lights  were all over my car and to the sides of the road. at the time it made me very scared not knowing what just happened. i have only mentioned it to my wife. i google it and came across a guy in pennsylvania who had a similar thing happen to him.  my question is have you heard of this kind of thing happen to anyone else? every night when i pass this area i think about that night and wonder what it could of been.
thanks
    [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Had bright green lights shoot all over the ground around my car while driving.

content.detailedDescription:
On the nights of may 3 & 4, 2013 while camping at millersylvania state park near tumwater wa. i and three others witnessed flyovers of unknown objects for over two hours; beginning at 9:30 pm and continuing until 11:45 pm. the sightings began with satellite like objects passing overhead, but traveling also in pairs and in groups of up to 6 objects. at times the objects passed over from multiple directions at once, in groups, and traveling in opposite directions as groups and single objects. 
the activity seemed to pick up a pace of sorts as the sighting went on to include "dark" "shadowy" craft that suddenly seemed to appear, take flight in long aching curves of varied speeds and heights. then the objects would flash so bright as to cast shadows around us.At one point the man with me commented that he didn't think 5 minutes had gone by without an object overhead, flashing at us and returning signals that i started to send back with very good lights. 
at one point, a square or cube shaped object appeared, elongated into a rectangle with a textured bottom of black and white "spots" that then became just white spaces moving across the black surface one after another. white space, black space moving like a conveyor belt. and then the surface appeared speckled brilliant white and jet black, pulsating that way and then disappeared. 
what i have started to call "blinkers". objects that seem to both "drop" in from above, fly in on an arch shaped path, suddenly just brighten and flash several times. these objects also seem to pass over again and again to signaling we initiated.
there was also reported "feelings" and "intuitive"  interaction in that a "feeling" would occur directly before a large display of light and motion. multiple objects traveling in different directions that flashed as they passed overhead. through binoculars the objects appear varied in colors, but mostly oranges, blacks, yellows, intense silver/whites both in surfaces and flashes with black centers that "radiate"the light from the objects surfaces. the light also radiates as spirals at given times.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiples of objects,  traveling various directions around mt. rainier & locale. flashing, blinking, descending, speed & directional changes. textured surface flashing

content.detailedDescription: I had got done watching tv (coincidentally i got done watching alien encounters) and decided to go into my bed room to lie down and watch more tv. i was laying there for at least 30 minutes or so when suddenly my cousin came running in the room. i was nearly sleep but he woke me up and told me to look out the window. when i looked out the window i saw several orange-yellow orbs scattered in the sky. my cousin ran outside while i grabbed my phone. unfortunately in my haste i didn't bother to grab my hd camera. when i made it outside i looked up and observed the objects as they flew through the sky. when i first noticed the objects, i thought they were ufo's. they weren't flares because they were traveling too straight. they weren't airplanes nor helicopters as they didn't appear to look like any nor they didn't make any noise. at first i saw at least 10 or so orb-shaped objects traveling in a loose formation and in a straight line, basically point a to b. they may have been 10-30 ft in diameter considering the distance they appeared to be from me. the objects made absolutely no noise as they traversed through the sky. they seemed to be traveling in a loose formation. the objects themselves appeared to be pulsating orange-yellow colors and were traveling very slow, probably 70 mph or slower (like they were in no rush to get where they needed to go). eventually they flew out of sight over the complex. i was so in awe that i didn't take any pictures or videos until another object appeared in the sky behind the first few. the lone object was going in the same direction as the others. i took the opportunity to snap a shot but it was of poor quality. it made me highly regret not grabbing my hd camera which would've gotten far better results, being that this was my first real ufo encounter! other witness's may have gotten better pictures/footage but that has yet to be seen. i guess next time i'll be a little more ready.
content.summary: Multiple orange-yellow orb-like objects

content.detailedDescription:
Okay for any one who's reading this first i want you to no that these things exists in a separate reality but they can tap in to ours . when i first saw the ufo i had a telepathic feeling that their telling me not to tell anyone , to keep this just for me like a test for intimacy i was in a psytrance festival on the highway 101 in the forst and as usual the whole vibe their was aliens :) 
i met these tow brothers in the party and they dropped me on their way to humboldt california , arcada i arrived their morning time it was my first time in humboldt i felt instead of going back to san francisco where i lived i though to o visit humboldt since im close i wondered around the city the whole day wearing a black t-shirt with an alien face that i drawn on it :) as night was coming i asked some people where can i find a cheap motel so i can get some sleep and someone told me that i have to get a car and drive about 5 miles from arcada their al find a nice chap hotel , i ddnt have a car and their was no cabs by that time so i had to walk the whole 5 miles i had my skateboard
with me so i skated half the way . soo tow miles has passed and i started to find my self in a dark place on my left  and right just farms and cows and kept walking and walking hoping im on the right way cuz where am walking theirs nothing but farms and theirs litterly no one on the road to ask i was afraid to arrive the motel late and not find a room then am gona have to walk another five miles back to arcada , umm and when i finally walked the whole five miles or even more i dont really no how much is it and how  people describe me the way i found my self coming up a hilll and i saw to motels :) the area was pretty much abundant theirs nothing but farms and these tow motels while i was coming up the hill i looked at my right and their it was a ******* flying saucer , a ufo vearyy clear and obvious in the sky when i first saw it i wasent sure what that is i dont no what made me think that if that was an airplane wich it clearly wasent cuz it looked like saucer disk shape it can reverse cuz airplane cant reverse and after i gad that thought the thing reversed then i realized that wah am looking at is a ufo vearry close to me right at the hight of the trees wich i dont remember after that the ufo started signaling me with green and blue light and as i heard from alot of witness the same thing blue & green light . that thing followed me  till i reached the motel it was vearry close from the motel i was thinking that i will go check in and get out with my laptop and video it while it was following me it was going behind the trees up an down theirs no way this thing could be a remote control devise or any thing like that cuz their was no one in the area at that time and it was a farm area anyways i got out of the motel looking for it it was gone !!!!!! i stayed up all night looking throw my window at the trees hoping they will come back since that day ive been hearing voices having delusions my psychic ability has improved to 100 % and same as my telepathic i havent told anyone yet its been almost a year i felt that i have to share this atleats online its crazzy i dont have to prove anything to anyone since my eyes saw the proof
content.summary: The ufo was small it could hold 1 or tow entities and it had a very peaceful and funny energy

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were at the end of my driveway hanging out when i noticed bright light rays shining through the trees from over the tennis courts moving seemingly slowly. i thought it was the sun at first but quickly dismissed the notion due to the fact that the light was so bright andd white and the sun was mainly below the horizon and the sun sets almost 180 degrees the other way. i thought it was strange because with all of the leaves on the trees light could not normally pass through that easily. it slowly hovered its way towards my neighborhood swimming pool which is across the street from my driveway at a slow speed. once it was over the pool from my point of view my friend and i could see the orb in plain sight with no obstructions like trees in the way. it went on an arc shaped path all the way down my street. from my swimming pool across my street and then back across finally heading east until the orb was out of sight. we didn't notice the little red tiny or orb which was maybe one 50th of the size of the larger white bright orb until it already passed the swimming pool and when it was flying away from us. the object seemed to maintain the same altitude throughout the sighting. it was definitely within the altitude height capabilities of a helicopter.  my friend whose grandfather was a pilot and is familiar with our human aircrafts like planes and helicopters agreed with me when i ruled out it being either a helicopter or an airplane. the only reason why we concluded this was because of it's unusually quietness for such a low altitude and the pulsating sound it made. we thought it might be some military craft but wondered why they would experiment with such a craft over a heavily populated area. sure enough about 10 to 15 minutes later at the exact same altitude going in the same direction the orb went, was a fighter type jet like an f16 or such. that is what really made us say ok, now the military is on to it. afterwords i was kicking myself for not taking my phone out of my pocket to video record it. i was in such awe i didn't think about it. the bizzarre idea that the craft sent some sort of brainwave down to keep us from getting our phones out was also in my mind afterwards but i doubt that was the case. i can't remember the date but i'm sure it was i. 2010.
content.summary: Friend and i saw bright white orb with tiny red dot attached under and at rear.

content.detailedDescription: As a housekeeper, i just finished working and was on my way home. it was dark out, but just getting dark. i was on the top of yerry hill rd. outside of woodstock ny, going down the hill, and saw the craft above the trees. i always love to think that helicopters and other craft may see me, so i wave or flash my headlights to see if i get a response...Sometimes small planes will tip their wings if they see you..It's fun. the craft was triangular with a v back or tail. the lights caught my eye in the dark, so i started flashing my headlights, thinking it was a government craft, and hoping they'd see me and maybe get a kick out of a civilian saying hi. then suddenly, it stopped over the trees. i pulled over and kept flashing my headlights.I was thrilled it probably saw me! i was thinking hey hello! this is cool! it hovered over the tree tops for about ten min. before i decided to head home, since i got no flashing lights back, and nothing much happened. at the time my windows were open, and i had shut my car off. i started my car.. headed home..And thought it was probably a new kind of government craft being test driven...Nothing more.  years later, when i told a friend about the incident, he asked what kind of sound the craft made, and i was surprised to recall that there was no sound at all. that is what made me think it was a u f o. i had no fear or any uncomfortable feelings about the craft, which looked to be black with red blue and green lights. i never thought to report it,because i just thought it was one of ours. but when i realized it was silent, i was tickled to think it was an alien craft. i was not aware of m u f o n until just a short time ago. so, that is my story, about my encounter with a suprising visiting craft!
content.summary: Saw lights nd craft..I flashed my headlights and followed for about 300yards till it stopped and hovered over treetopsaa

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio  smoking at around 10 pm . when something caught my eye, i look up to see what looked like the belly of a large transport plane. there was a low ceiling of clouds that night and the exxon station a block away was reflecting a lot of light off this object or i my have not seen it. my patio faces north and this object came over my house heading directly north, paralleling pearson that runs north and south next to my house. as i was watching it i couldn't make out any wings, i figured maybe the darkness was keeping me from seeing them. so i thought maybe i could get a glimpse of the tail section. no couldn't see any tail section either. but i did see a white band or stripe around what appeared to be the end of the object, with some other letters or markings by the band. it was very low for an object this size to be flying, maybe 100-150 ft.? low enough i thought it might scrape the pine thicket where it was headed. trying to rationalize this, i thought drug smugglers coasting in to an airport, because there was absolutely no sound or lights. it was moving at about 30mph, slow but steady, in 15 or 20 seconds it disappered into the darkness. any airport was too far and in the wrong direction. i'am 15 miles from dfw airport which is southeast of me and alliance which is about the same distance to the northwest. wished i had called 9/11, but i wasn't sure what i saw or what to report.
content.summary: Noticed what looked like the belly of large transport going directly over my house at a low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: It was july 2010 at aproximately 9pm and i was talking to my aunt on the phone while pacing the driveway of the home i was staying at. i turned towards the home i was staying at and saw a orange orb about 15-20 feet in diameter slowly glide powerline level towards the intersection. at first i didn't mention it to my aunt why i do not know and i continued to pace back and forth taking my eyes off the object but everytime i turned around it got closer and then i mentioned it to my aunt but for years i have spoken about being visited by what i call "oli" other life form intelligence. the orb itself seemed to be alive, for months before this sighting i saw red and white dots deep in space. the red dots being faster than the white ones but the white ones having the ability to split. night after night i witnessed these red and white dots out in space i even heard my mother tell me there was a report on the news about red dots over the great lakes somewhere around the same weeks i was seeing what i was seeing. i no longer saw the red dots after the orange orb came. back to the orange orb, the orb was about 30 feet from the drive way and didn't shine light on other objects although it was very bright. i turned my back many times but it got my attention when it changed course in an 90 degree angle and slowly went over the trees i didn't bother to follow it because odds are it won't be the last time i see a "ufo" and i was right because i've seen them since 2006 and have been visited without my knowning before that. i know they come and go and i know there are more than one species and more than one species has visted me.
content.summary: Orange orb that seemed to be alive itself

content.detailedDescription:
Large triangle shape, pulating colors. could hint a slight outline.
seemed about 300 ft in size. no noise just silent pulsating with colors.

seemed to interfere with electronics....Tried to record but phone seemed to be affected
content.summary: It was just a stange glowing/pulsating/clorful object.... but it seemed to affect all electronic devices... cuz my phone started making weird noises..Buzzed static which it never does and the street lights seemed to be on the fritz

content.detailedDescription: A few seconds later, 2 of the streaks returned to the orb
content.summary: Extremely bright.After 5 minutes three streaks shot out from the orb simutaneosly

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my house on this day i have been working on my perpetual energy machine thinking and reading about nicholas tesla and as i was making a left unto east street , my van  stop no light or any sound of engine.  alone some kind of energy pull me into a ship i saw some light but i felt  a lot of energy like a magnet  which pull in.  i so a lot  of people they all look like us and they communicate with me mentally  no verbal, the ship was huge and a lot of machines they was trying to tell me about speed and energy.  well they took me from  south salem, ny to san francisco, california and they show me a lot of things it seems like months but at the same time they took me back to the same location , i notice the golden bridge, the panama canal, the verrazano bridge then  to my van i notice that the time was the same. by the way they took something out of my skull, it looks like my brain.  i would like some kind of test to find out what do they took.  i have not been the same since.  i think that i have the answer to the speed and the energy as we know.  i would like to show some one how the ship operated and what kind of engine did i saw..

i feel that i've been watch
content.summary: Very intelligent cooperative and compressive

content.detailedDescription:
May 1st, 2013 temp: 64deg sky:clear telescope spaceprobe 3 76mm using a 25mm eyepiece for 28x.
location: back yard
what i was doing: star watching - astronomy.

while looking for the owl nebula i saw a bright orange object cross my eyepiece field of view. the object size hard to tell but when first sighted it took up 1/4 of my eyepiece. the object looked like a snake with a inner bright fire which was orange red in color, it moved like a snake it had s shaped body segments like a snake does when moving and there was a pulsating of the inner light starting from its end going to its head it seemed like the light was its motive force.It passed thru my eyepiece fov in about 1 1/2 sec. just after it passed i looked up trying to find it with my naked eye but saw nothing of it.The pulsating was vary rapid bottom to top top was head nnw along the bottom of the big dipper. i never thought i would ever see a ufo but to see this puts a new twist to it. have anyone seen anything like this before? i was not going to report this my friends think ive cracked
but i have to know i am not alone seening this kind of object.
content.summary: Snake like object came within field of view of eyepiece of telescope

content.detailedDescription: Lets begin with the fact that i am a retired state police officer with extensive training in observational techniques so what my wife and i saw and as i report it here is as accurate as it can be. we are non drinkers, non smokers, non drug users. so these are the particulars: at about 9:30 pm, 5/4/13 we were watching television in our family room/sun room ( which has 12 floor to almost ceiling height windows, skylights and trapezoid end windows) when my wife observed a strange glowing orb in the sky traveling from east to west at a rather slow speed. i looked and saw it also and initially thought it was a roman candle firework someone shot into the sky till i realized it was moving at a steady rate of speed horizontally. also we both realized upon going out upon our deck that the object made no sound, had no landing lights, no flashing lights and left no contrail. this glowing orb had within the glow what appeared to us to be a faint solid four pointed object . this glowing orb/object continued in its steady horizontal westward path towards cleveland while maintaining its elevation and ultimately went out of sight. this was a clear and quiet evening in a rural setting, in the country without distractions of lights or sound. once again, it was a red/orange glowing orb that traveled without sound or other lights, had a solid looking something within the glow and we observed it for approx 2 to 3 minutes. it is hard to tell the size or distance but it was close enough to see it clearly. if my cell phone would not have been charging in another room i could have taken photos but we both stood mesmerized by what we saw. to me it clearly was not anything i had seen before and we do see and hear airplanes, helicopters etc fly over our home quite regularly, this was nothing like anything we had seen before. also i should mention that it was a warm evening and our sliders and skylights were open and our deck in one step down out of our sunroom.  also we are situated on a piece of property that has an unobstructed view of miles of sky. what was it, we do not know. i did tell my wife that come morning there will be many people reporting the same as we saw due to its unusual look etc. the following day garnered no other news or internet reports. we felt the need to report it so here it is.
content.summary: Glowing orb with faint structure within the glow traveling without sound or any other lights , no contrail or tail.
